metadata.description: For this first installment of "The Jewish Brigade" we find ourselves in 1945 Poland. Leslie and Ari, two British soldiers, carry out an ambush near a church. They're looking for a priest... that Leslie then kills. He was an SS agent. The two men get back on the road; other missions await. Marvano takes us through the ranks of one of the least known divisions of the British army.
metadata.name: The Jewish Brigade
